nodes.text: Classic Star Wars: Devilworlds is a two-part comic collection that is part of the Classic Star Wars series of comics and re-publishes several of the more obscure Star Wars tales by Alan Moore from Marvel UK's magazine. The artwork has been colored, reformatted, and retouched by Dark Horse Comics. It is notable for featuring stories of ambiguous canonicity with several of the tales only being recently referenced and brought into the official continuity.
The series is composed of two issues released between August 1996 and September 1996.
The stories in Devilworlds are part of Marvel Comics's Star Wars comics and fall into the same level of canon.
